name: Hong Kong
description: Hong Kong is a bustling city known for its skyscrapers, vibrant street markets, and lively food scene. Located on China's south coast, Hong Kong is a major port and financial hub with a skyline dominated by high-rises. The city is famous for its deep natural harbor, Victoria Harbour, and its dense urbanization. Visitors can explore cultural landmarks like Victoria Peak, the Tian Tan Buddha, and the bustling markets of Mong Kok and Temple Street. Hong Kong offers a diverse range of cuisine, from dim sum and Cantonese dishes to international flavors.

foods.name: Dim Sum
foods.description: Traditional Cantonese meal of small dishes served with tea, including dumplings, buns, and rolls.

foods.name: Roast Goose
foods.description: Crispy-skinned goose roasted to perfection, a popular Hong Kong specialty.

foods.name: Won Ton Noodles
foods.description: Egg noodles served in a clear broth with wontons filled with shrimp or pork.

foods.name: Pineapple Bun
foods.description: Sweet bun topped with a crusty layer resembling a pineapple, often served with butter.

foods.name: Egg Tarts
foods.description: Flaky pastry filled with egg custard, a popular Hong Kong dessert.

foods.name: Siu Mei
foods.description: Roasted meats like pork, duck, or chicken served with rice or noodles.

restaurants.name: Tim Ho Wan

restaurants.name: Yung Kee Restaurant

restaurants.name: Mak's Noodle

restaurants.name: Tai Cheong Bakery

restaurants.name: Joy Hing Roasted Meat
